patthana18.11:1.1_0: Hetusampayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetusampayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.11:2.1_0: Hetuvippayuttaṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana18.11:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe cattāri …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana18.11:3.1_0: Hetusampayuttaṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetuvippayutto nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.11:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe pañca, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… sahajāte aññamaññe pañca …pe… purejāte āsevane tīṇi …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
